w, but....
=C2=A0
It seems the main focus on their show is evp's and spirit=
 communication, which is preferred for my taste.=C2=A0 But they are using t=
he sb7 ghost box.=C2=A0 That is the worst box to use for spirit communicati=
on, it gets poor reception and the sweep is horrible.=C2=A0 Any voices that=
 could and do come through are drowned out by the unnecessary white noise i=
ncorporated into the sweep.
=C2=A0
I would like to get in touch with them a=
nd give them a quality ghost box to work with.
=C2=A0
So.....Does anybody k=
now how i can get a hold of these guys?
